text: Lyudmila Petrovna Senchina (; 13 December 1950, – 25 January 2018) was a Soviet, Ukrainian and Russian singer (soprano). She was also an actress, appearing in Armed and Dangerous (), in which Lyudmila performed a female lead role. == Works == Senchina was known for her songs Cinderella and Pebbles (), Stones (), Love and Separation (), White Acacia (), Birthday (), White Dance (), Field Flowers (). == Awards == In 1979 she was awarded the title of Meritorious Artist of the RSFSR and in 2002 the title of People's Artist of Russia. Merited Artist of Ukraine (2003).Указ Президента України від 15 травня 2003 року № 407 Senchina died on 25 January 2018 in a hospital in St. Petersburg of pancreatic cancer at the age of 67.A week and a half to death Senchina in a comaВ Петербурге на 68-м году умерла Людмила Сенчина ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Russia Category:Russian singers Category:Russian movie actors Category:Soviet singers Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Ukrainian singers
title: Lyudmila Senchina
